subject: nullpointerexception junitext accessing xml file
msgSnippet: im very new to java and junit, when i run the following code im getting a nullpointer exception , i want to take input from an xml file, the xml file is
messageBody:
im very new to java and junit, when i run the following code im getting a nullpointer exception , i want to take input from an xml file, the xml file is located in same location as the java file, i pasted the stack trace below, im using eclipse , any help would be most welcomed

import static org.junit.Assert.*;
import org.junit.Test;
import org.junit.runner.RunWith;
import org.junitext.Category;
import org.junitext.XMLParameters;
import org.junitext.runners.XMLParameterizedRunner;


@RunWith(XMLParameterizedRunner.class)
public class FibonacciTest1 {

private int fInput;
private int fExpected;

private Fibonacci f1=new Fibonacci();

@XMLParameters("NewFile.xml")
public FibonacciTest1(int input,int expected){
fInput=input;
fExpected=expected;
}
@Category("A")
@Test public void test(){
System.out.println(fExpected + " " + fInput);
assertEquals(fExpected,f1.fibonacci(fInput));
}


}


im pasting the stack trace below,

java.lang.NullPointerException
